overview: Mr. Park serves as the BizSlate’s Chief Technology Officer. Most recently, Mr. Park was the Founder and Managing Partner of Park & Co., a boutique consulting firm specializing in the management, engineering and development of software solutions and applications for Web 2.0, ERP, and Finance. Prior to that, as Vice President of Technology for FreshDirect, an online fresh food manufacturing and distribution company that serves the direct-to-consumer market and the food service industry with the freshest possible perishable foods, Mr. Park was responsible for the technology infrastructure and the backend engineering and operations for the entire company, from inception through FreshDirectâ€™s quick and aggressive growth.
